HBO AsiaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s first Original series, a ten-episode detective noir series set against the tumultuous backdrop of 1960s Singapore, when the global balance of power is shifting and Singapore is at its crossroad; a time when the British colonial rule is coming to an end, independence is on the horizon, and the island state can finally forge its own identity. 

Set in 1964-65, Singapore is at a crossroads, with political and racial tensions at fever pitch as the British pull out. Sam Callaghan runs an import/export business with his Malay partner Kang. He agrees to help neighbour Patricia Cheng at her detective agency after her husband is killed while working on a case.
